features.title: Event Management
features.description: Easily create and manage your events from a single platform.

features.description: Find the event that suits you and participate in just a few clicks !

security_subtitle: Your events, always safe and secure.
data_subtitle: All your data is protected. We use advanced security protocols to ensure your information remains confidential and secure.
backups_subtitle: We regularly back up all your event data to prevent any loss. In case of an issue, your events are securely stored and can be restored immediately.
support_subtitle: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you in case of any issues. Whether it's a technical problem or a simple question, we're here to ensure your events run smoothly.
active_subscription_message: You already have an active subscription. To change your subscription, please cancel your current subscription first.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about EaseEvent.

1.header: How can I create an event?
1.content: To create an event, simply click on the 'Create Event' button on the dashboard and follow the on-screen instructions to enter the necessary details, such as event name, date, and venue.

2.content: Absolutely. We use state-of-the-art encryption protocols to ensure your data remains confidential and secure at all times. We also perform regular backups to protect against data loss.

3.content: Once your invitations are sent, you can track RSVP responses in real-time from your event management dashboard. You‚Äôll also receive notifications when someone responds.

4.header: What if I need help with my event?
4.content: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you. You can contact us through live chat, email, or phone for any help you need regarding event setup or management.
